---
layout: default
title: AP2030-AAS Schemas
---

# AP2030 Asset Administration Shell Schemas

This repository contains Asset Administration Shell (AAS) definitions and JSON schemas for the AP2030-UNS project.

## Available Schemas

All schemas are automatically synchronized from the `schemas/` directory. Click on any schema below to view its details.

<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-SCHEMAS-START -->

  - [View on GitHub Pages](https://aausmartproductionlab.github.io/AP2030-UNS/MQTTSchemas/amrArclResponse.schema.json)

- **[amrArclUpdate.schema.json](MQTTSchemas/amrArclUpdate.schema.json)**
  - [View on GitHub Pages](https://aausmartproductionlab.github.io/AP2030-UNS/MQTTSchemas/amrArclUpdate.schema.json)

- **[command.schema.json](MQTTSchemas/command.schema.json)**
  - An arbitrary command
  - [View on GitHub Pages](https://aausmartproductionlab.github.io/AP2030-UNS/MQTTSchemas/command.schema.json)
  - [Raw](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AAUSmartProductionLab/AP2030-UNS/main/MQTTSchemas/command.schema.json)
- **[commandResponse.schema.json](MQTTSchemas/commandResponse.schema.json)**
  - An arbitrary command response
  - [View on GitHub Pages](https://aausmartproductionlab.github.io/AP2030-UNS/MQTTSchemas/commandResponse.schema.json)
  - [Raw](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AAUSmartProductionLab/AP2030-UNS/main/MQTTSchemas/commandResponse.schema.json)
- **[config.schema.json](MQTTSchemas/config.schema.json)**
  - JSON Schema for a generic configuration. Matches any of the config schemas
  - [View on GitHub Pages](https://aausmartproductionlab.github.io/AP2030-UNS/MQTTSchemas/config.schema.json)
  - [Raw](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AAUSmartProductionLab/AP2030-UNS/main/MQTTSchemas/config.schema.json)
- **[count.schema.json](MQTTSchemas/count.schema.json)**
  - JSON Schema for counting units in production processes
  - [View on GitHub Pages](https://aausmartproductionlab.github.io/AP2030-UNS/MQTTSchemas/count.schema.json)
  - [Raw](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AAUSmartProductionLab/AP2030-UNS/main/MQTTSchemas/count.schema.json)
- **[data.schema.json](MQTTSchemas/data.schema.json)**
  - A base class for all data messages
  - [View on GitHub Pages](https://aausmartproductionlab.github.io/AP2030-UNS/MQTTSchemas/data.schema.json)
  - [Raw](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AAUSmartProductionLab/AP2030-UNS/main/MQTTSchemas/data.schema.json)
- **[image.schema.json](MQTTSchemas/image.schema.json)**
  - JSON Schema for byte encoded images
  - [View on GitHub Pages](https://aausmartproductionlab.github.io/AP2030-UNS/MQTTSchemas/image.schema.json)
  - [Raw](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AAUSmartProductionLab/AP2030-UNS/main/MQTTSchemas/image.schema.json)
- **[moveCommand.json](MQTTSchemas/moveCommand.json)**
  - [View on GitHub Pages](https://aausmartproductionlab.github.io/AP2030-UNS/MQTTSchemas/moveCommand.json)
  - [Raw](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AAUSmartProductionLab/AP2030-UNS/main/MQTTSchemas/moveCommand.json)
- **[moveToPosition.schema.json](MQTTSchemas/moveToPosition.schema.json)**
  - [View on GitHub Pages](https://aausmartproductionlab.github.io/AP2030-UNS/MQTTSchemas/moveToPosition.schema.json)
  - [Raw](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AAUSmartProductionLab/AP2030-UNS/main/MQTTSchemas/moveToPosition.schema.json)
- **[order.schema.json](MQTTSchemas/order.schema.json)**
  - JSON Schema for an order
  - [View on GitHub Pages](https://aausmartproductionlab.github.io/AP2030-UNS/MQTTSchemas/order.schema.json)
  - [Raw](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AAUSmartProductionLab/AP2030-UNS/main/MQTTSchemas/order.schema.json)
- **[planarLimits.schema.json](MQTTSchemas/planarLimits.schema.json)**
  - Configuration for the speed and acceleration limits of planar motors
  - [View on GitHub Pages](https://aausmartproductionlab.github.io/AP2030-UNS/MQTTSchemas/planarLimits.schema.json)
  - [Raw](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AAUSmartProductionLab/AP2030-UNS/main/MQTTSchemas/planarLimits.schema.json)
- **[planarStations.schema.json](MQTTSchemas/planarStations.schema.json)**
  - The station configuration of the production line
  - [View on GitHub Pages](https://aausmartproductionlab.github.io/AP2030-UNS/MQTTSchemas/planarStations.schema.json)
  - [Raw](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AAUSmartProductionLab/AP2030-UNS/main/MQTTSchemas/planarStations.schema.json)
- **[productId.schema.json](MQTTSchemas/productId.schema.json)**
  - JSON Schema for the status the Id of a product. Usefull to associate stations with a product when they process it
  - [View on GitHub Pages](https://aausmartproductionlab.github.io/AP2030-UNS/MQTTSchemas/productId.schema.json)
  - [Raw](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AAUSmartProductionLab/AP2030-UNS/main/MQTTSchemas/productId.schema.json)
- **[state.schema.json](MQTTSchemas/state.schema.json)**
  - JSON Schema for the status of a module. The current Uuid is expected when the module is not in a IDLE or RESETTING state
  - [View on GitHub Pages](https://aausmartproductionlab.github.io/AP2030-UNS/MQTTSchemas/state.schema.json)
  - [Raw](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AAUSmartProductionLab/AP2030-UNS/main/MQTTSchemas/state.schema.json)
- **[stationOccupation.schema.json](MQTTSchemas/stationOccupation.schema.json)**
  - JSON Schema for the status of a module. The current Uuid is expected when the module is not in a IDLE or RESETTING state
  - [View on GitHub Pages](https://aausmartproductionlab.github.io/AP2030-UNS/MQTTSchemas/stationOccupation.schema.json)
  - [Raw](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AAUSmartProductionLab/AP2030-UNS/main/MQTTSchemas/stationOccupation.schema.json)
- **[stationState.schema.json](MQTTSchemas/stationState.schema.json)**
  - JSON Schema for the status of a module. The current Uuid is expected when the module is not in a IDLE or RESETTING state
  - [View on GitHub Pages](https://aausmartproductionlab.github.io/AP2030-UNS/MQTTSchemas/stationState.schema.json)
  - [Raw](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AAUSmartProductionLab/AP2030-UNS/main/MQTTSchemas/stationState.schema.json)
- **[weight.schema.json](MQTTSchemas/weight.schema.json)**
  - JSON Schema for a IPC weighing using a scale
  - [View on GitHub Pages](https://aausmartproductionlab.github.io/AP2030-UNS/MQTTSchemas/weight.schema.json)
  - [Raw](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AAUSmartProductionLab/AP2030-UNS/main/MQTTSchemas/weight.schema.json)

<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-SCHEMAS-END -->

## Behavior Tree Definitions

The behavior tree XML files define the control logic for the production line controller.

<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-BT-START -->
- **[asepticFilling.xml](BTDescriptions/asepticFilling.xml)**
  - Tree ID: `AsepticFilling`

## Usage

### Schemas

Access schemas directly via GitHub Pages:
```
https://aausmartproductionlab.github.io/AP2030-UNS/schemas/command.schema.json
```

Or via raw GitHub URLs:
```
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AAUSmartProductionLab/AP2030-UNS/main/schemas/command.schema.json
```

### Behavior Trees

Access behavior tree XML files via GitHub Pages:
```
https://aausmartproductionlab.github.io/AP2030-UNS/bt_description/tree.xml
```

Or via raw GitHub URLs:
```
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AAUSmartProductionLab/AP2030-UNS/main/BT_Controller/config/bt_description/tree.xml
```
